name: lead-management-dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for Google Sheets lead management

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.vercel-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyRecursiveSync(src,dest){const exists=fs.existsSync(src);const stats=exists&&fs.statSync(src);const isDirectory=exists&&stats.isDirectory();if(isDirectory){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(childItemName=>{copyRecursiveSync(path.join(src,childItemName),path.join(dest,childItemName))})}else{fs.copyFileSync(src,dest)}}copyRecursiveSync('client/build','.')}"
